snippet: The appointment of Denis R. McDonough would continue President Obama’s practice of putting the people he trusts most in critical positions.
abstract: Pres Obama is planning to elevate key national security deputy Denis R McDonough to White House chief of staff, continuing Obama's practice of putting people he trusts most in critical positions.
lead_paragraph: The appointment of Denis R. McDonough would continue President Obama’s practice of putting the people he trusts most in critical positions.

headline.seo: Denis McDonough to Become White House Chief of Staff
headline.main: Obama Plans to Name Close Aide on National Security as Chief of Staff
headline.print_headline: Obama Plans to Name Close Aide on National Security as Chief of Staff
